quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
Who overcomes by force, hath overcome but half his foe.
When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
When you know that you can overcome challenges, you do gain that self-respect, and then you won't end up in a situation that you regret later on.
A child who has overcome challenges with proper emotional support will emerge stronger.
You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
Give yourself an even greater challenge than the one you are trying to master and you will develop the powers necessary to overcome the original difficulty.
It makes one a better person to have had hardships and to have overcome hardships and not to blame anybody else for your mistakes.
So many objections may be made to everything, that nothing can overcome them but the necessity of doing something.
When you accept the fact that your true identity includes being anÂ overcomer, you will never settle for less than a miracle.
One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
Everyone wants to be anÂ overcomer, but nobody wants anything to overcome.
They who overcome their desires once can overcome them always.
The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
You were not built for comfort and convenience. You were built to overcome.
Who has a harder fight than he who is striving to overcome himself.
